name: Encode Decode Tool
author: Weblineindia

sections.description:
An Online Encode Decode Tool to convert content into ASCII character-set.

Our tool uses in-built JavaScript function for encoding.

Key Features

  • Admin can enable/disable the plugin functionality.
  • Admin can easily set button label text, button text and background colors.
  • Can be used as a widget.
  • Shortcode is also available to use the plugin anywhere in posts and pages.

Note

This plugin is an Open Source Software and we would be happy to have people contribute to our plugin. Please contact us here to talk to our software development team, if you would like to contribute to this plugin and help make it better.

If you like this plugin then please rate our plugin to help us spread the word.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/plugin-name’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress admin dashborad.

  3. Use the Settings-> Encode Decode Tool – By Webline screen to configure the plugin setting.

short_description: A Free tool to Encode or Decode your content into ASCII character-set.
